attributes.action: Stop all immigration to the United Kingdom of Great Britain, until job stability for British subjects is achieved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop all immigration to the United Kingdom of Great Britain, until job stability for British subjects is achieved.
This is to be achieved by the stopping of mass immigration from the European Union, better pay for British Workers and an increase in industry jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
